thread.title: Ford Leads $65 Million Investment in Desktop Metal - WSJ

author: Yuliya Chernova
title: Ford Leads $65 Million Investment in Desktop Metal - WSJ

organizations.name: million investment in desktop metal - wsj desktop metal inc.

text:
Desktop Metal Inc., a maker of 3-D printers that was valued at more than $1 billion last year, has brought on Ford Motor Co. as a strategic investor.
The auto maker led a $65 million investment into the startup, joining existing investor Future Fund.
Burlington, Mass.-based Desktop Metal, which has 225 employees, is developing 3-D technology... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
